indications: Common cold, fever, vomiting, dysentery, jaundice

contraindications: It should not be used medicinally by pregnant women though it is perfectly safe in small amounts for culinary purposes.

notes: This herb is used for chronic bronchitis.
It helps to improve the appetite and digestion.
In Austrian folk medicine, oregano was used internally (as tea) or externally (as ointment) for treatment of disorders of the gastrointestinal tract, respiratory tract, and nervous system.
Externally, oregano is used to treat bronchitis, asthma, arthritis and muscular pain.
